00038 class ValuesDialogImpl: public QDialog, public Ui::ValuesDialog {

00046 
00047         std::string print ();
00048 
00049         double tmin () { return atof (Min[0]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00050         double tmax () { return atof (Max[0]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00051         unsigned tsteps () { return Slider[0]->value (); }
00052         double dt () { return (tmax ()-tmin ())/double (tsteps ()); }
00053 
00054         double umin () { return atof (Min[1]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00055         double umax () { return atof (Max[1]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00056         unsigned usteps () { return Slider[1]->value (); }
00057         double du () { return (umax ()-umin ())/double (usteps ()); }
00058 
00059         double vmin () { return atof (Min[2]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00060         double vmax () { return atof (Max[2]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00061         unsigned vsteps () { return Slider[2]->value (); }
00062         double dv () { return (vmax ()-vmin ())/double (vsteps ()); }
00063
